title: Streaking - Symphony Pet
description:
Take multitasking cleaning to a whole new level.
The unique design of the BISSELL® Symphony™ Pet All-in-One Vacuum and Steam Mop allows you to vacuum pet hair and debris and steam clean your hard floors at the same time.  Switch seamlessly between functions while cleaning with the Easy Touch Digital Controls™ so you can vacuum and steam at the same or separately based on your cleaning needs. Choose between washable mop pads for everyday messes or disposable Swiffer™ BISSELL® SteamBoost™ mop pads for pet messes you want to throw away. Keep your hands clean with the innovative Drop-IT™ tank emptying system. Plus, keep your pet friendly home free of harmful chemicals by using the power of steam to sanitize* your floors – all you need is water. 

    The BISSELL® Symphony™ Pet All-in-One Vacuum and Steam Mop lets you vacuum and steam clean your floors at the same time.
    Exclusive Drop-IT™ technology gives you a no-hassle, hands-free tank making it easier to empty messes and pet hair.
    Swiffer™ BISSELL® SteamBoost™ disposable mop pads clean up your worst pet messes while leaving a fresh, open-window scent behind.
    Easy Touch Digital Controls allows you three ways to clean - quickly switch among high steam, low steam and vacuum functions.
    Improved powerful suction for better pet hair pick up.
    Washable mop pads let you tackle your everyday messes over and over
    Naturally sanitize* your floors with only water – no chemicals.
    2 year limited warranty.

*When using the microfiber cloth pad and use as directed, results may vary. Tested under controlled lab condition.

http://www.bissell.com/symphony-pet-all-in-one-vacuum-and-steam-mop-1543

transcripts: Before using, check to make sure that your pad is clean. You can wash the pads with a mild detergent in your washing machine, but do not use fabric softener or bleach. If there is an odd looking substance on the pad, the streaking is likely caused by dirt or residual cleaning products. If you have used floor polish or wax space cleaners on your floors, steam products may decrease the glossiness. Refer to the wax or polish manufacturer for removal. if you don't wax or polish your floors, check the floor care instructions from your flooring manufacturer.
